topic.title: PoC Bundle Network Configuration
topic.shortdesc: The PoC bundle configuration logical networking will look like Figure 3: PoC Networking Layout with no network connections requiring 802.1q vLAN tagging.

body.p: The bundle includes a Dell Force10 S55 switch to which all nodes will be connected. This bundle is configured with no network redundancy. The rack layout is similar to Figure 4: PoC Bundle.
body.note: Please note that all nodes are stacked together, with a single switch above them.
